title: The 'Up' arrow is not displayed on the footer of the site
description: The arrow does not appear either after refreshing the page
steps_to_reproduce: open the main page of the site
scroll to the footer of the site
pay attention to the right corner of the site
expected_result: The 'Up' arrow is displayed in the right corner of the site
actual_result: The 'Up' arrow is not displayed in the right corner of the site
